    • initOnOpen

      public void initOnOpen()
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: JposCommonProperties
      Initialization of properties that must be initialized during open.

    • claim

      public void claim(int timeout) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of setting claim. Can be overwritten within derived classes. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device has not been closed,
      • The device is not claimed,
      • ExclusiveUse dos not equal ExclusiveNo,
      • timeout is negative not equal to FOREVER.
      Angegeben von:
      claim in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      claim in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Parameter:
      timeout - see UPOS specification, method Claim
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs while claiming the device

    • release

      public void release() throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of release method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is claimed,
      • ExclusiveUse equals ExclusiveYes: Device is not enabled.
      Angegeben von:
      release in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      release in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - See UPOS specification, method Release

    • handlePowerStateOnEnable

      public void handlePowerStateOnEnable() throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Will be called whenever DeviceEnabled will be set to true if power notification is enabled (PowerNotify = PN_ENABLED). Should update the PowerState property. Further processing like firing a StatusUpdateEvent is not necessary, this will be made by the framework automatically.
      Angegeben von:
      handlePowerStateOnEnable in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      handlePowerStateOnEnable in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs.

    • checkHealth

      public void checkHealth(int level) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: JposBaseInterface
      Final part of CheckHealth method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. Keep in mind that dvice class specific checks (e.g. check of Claimed or DeviceEnabled) must be done within derived classes. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is neither enabled nor claimed.
      Angegeben von:
      checkHealth in Schnittstelle JposBaseInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      checkHealth in Klasse JposCommonProperties
      Parameter:
      level - See UPOS specification, method CheckHealth
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - See UPOS specification, method CheckHealth

    • switchOff

      public void switchOff(int lightNumber) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: LightsInterface
      Final part of SwitchOff method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is enabled,
      • lightNumber is between 1 and MaxLights.
      Angegeben von:
      switchOff in Schnittstelle LightsInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      switchOff in Klasse LightsProperties
      Parameter:
      lightNumber - light number between 1 and MaxLights.
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs.

    • switchOn

      public void switchOn(int lightNumber, int blinkOnCycle, int blinkOffCycle, int color, int alarm) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: LightsInterface
      Final part of SwitchOn method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is enabled,
      • lightNumber is between 1 and MaxLights,
      • CapColor is COLOR_PRIMARY or color is one of the colors specified by CapColor,
      • CapAlarm is ALARM_NOALARM or alarm is one of the alarms specified by CapAlarm.
      Angegeben von:
      switchOn in Schnittstelle LightsInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      switchOn in Klasse LightsProperties
      Parameter:
      lightNumber - light number between 1 and MaxLights.
      blinkOnCycle - If blinking, light-on time in milliseconds.
      blinkOffCycle - If blinking, light-off time in milliseconds.
      color - Light color as specified by CapColor.
      alarm - Alarm value as specified by CapAlarm.
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs.

    • switchOnMultiple

      public void switchOnMultiple(String lightNumbers, int blinkOnCycle, int blinkOffCycle, int color, int alarm) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: LightsProperties
      Final part of SwitchOn method. Can be overwritten in derived class, if necessary. This method will be called only if the following plausibility checks lead to a positive result:
      • Device is enabled,
      • lightNumbers consists of a comma separated list of numbers between 1 and MaxLights,
      • CapColor is COLOR_PRIMARY or color is one of the colors specified by CapColor,
      • CapAlarm is ALARM_NOALARM or alarm is one of the alarms specified by CapAlarm.
      Angegeben von:
      switchOnMultiple in Schnittstelle LightsInterface
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      switchOnMultiple in Klasse LightsProperties
      Parameter:
      lightNumbers - light numbers between 1 and MaxLights, separated by comma.
      blinkOnCycle - If blinking, light-on time in milliseconds.
      blinkOffCycle - If blinking, light-off time in milliseconds.
      color - Light color as specified by CapColor.
      alarm - Alarm value as specified by CapAlarm.
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If an error occurs.
